text: Elliot Goldenthal (born May 2, 1954 in Brooklyn, New York City) is an American composer of modern classical music. He was a student of Aaron Copland and John Corigliano. Goldenthal is best known for his ability to blend different musical styles and techniques in original and inventive ways. ==Movie works== * 1979 - Cocaine Cowboys * 1980 - Blank Generation * 1989 - Drugstore Cowboy score * 1989 -
